page.title: 17A BOY'S DAY ON SCORAIG
page.content: "I GET UP AT 8am AND SET OFF FOR SCHOOL WITH MY SISTER.WE GO THROUGH THE NEXT CROFT AND FROM THERE THERE IS A TRACK,SO WE CAN CYCLE.I GET TO SCHOOL AT HALF NINE. WE USUALLY START WITH SUMS,THEN SOME SORT OF ENGLISH. "BREAK IS AT 11am AND LUNCH IS FROM 11.50am TILL 2pm.DURING LUNCHTIME WE PLAY OUTSIDE AND IF IT IS WET WE PLAY ON THE COMPUTER.AFTER LUNCH WE READ AND FINISH OUR WORK AND PERHAPS PAINT OR PLAY GAMES. "AT 4pm WE START OUT FOR HOME.IT IS ABOUT 2 KILOMETRES AWAY AND WE OFTEN STOP TO PLAY ON THE WAY.WHEN I GET HOME AT NIGHT I PLAY FOOTBALL OR GO OUT IN THE CANOE. WE HAVE TEA AT 8pm, SO WE MIGHT WATCH T.V. BEFORE THAT OR PRACTICE THE CELLO. AT 9pm I GO TO BED.
